page.title: 10HOUSING (Ref.03600375A)
page.content: {BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375 } HOUSING 1:There are 1236 dwellings in the area; most in village situation, few scattered 30% pre-39 war,65% private, 32% rented; 70% post-39 war - 60% private, 40% rented.Majority of housing 20th century, some 19th century, a few pre-19th century.Houses built of traditional brick with slate or tiled roofs.Most 20th century houses have good sized gardens except latest private houses.Why live here? Reasonable prices, closeness to work, centre of Cheshire, open aspects, near to countryside but close to a town, quite new property.About 25% Barnton people lived there all their lives. 36% moved from within 8km, 39% from other places.In the country area which is 80% of total area only 9 houses.All are 30 years or more in age.
